title: Touchpad issues
body: So i bought a new toshiba windows 10 laptop recently and its all fine but when i play league my clicks wont work if my cursor is moving. i cant seem to find a setting on this... is there a way to fix this?

replies.body:
Touchpads, *specifically* multipoint ones, don't interact well with League most of the time. There may be a setting inside the software that controls your touchpad (likely Synaptics) that is causing this behavior. You may want to [complete a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#wq7) if you can't find the setting.

Let me know if anything changed.
